name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 6: The Wai Wai Combat
overview: Simple Wii Series Vol. 6: The Wai Wai Combat (SIMPLE Wiiシリーズ Vol.6 THE ワイワイ・コンバット) is an action shooting game that, no matter what, people can play. There are three kinds of scenes available for the game. Players can play a match between up to six people through Nintendo's wireless global network, using weapons of all abilities and competing for the first place!
